Class XmlPatcherWorker<T,P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.module.xmlpatcher.worker.XmlPatcherWorker<T,P>

    T - the type of the processed entity
    P - the parent type of the processed entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends java.lang.Object
